14 Gregory Hall Urbana, Illinois
TOi NAEB Board of Directors
Joint Council on Educational Television
ETRC Board of Directors
NCCET Executive Committee
Dr, Arthur Adams, American Council on Education
FROM: Frank E, Schooley
Since I have been requested by one or two of you to furnish a copy of my
letter to Mr. McNeil Lowry of the Ford Foundation in which I voiced the views of
NAEB on the JCET request to the Ford Foundation, I am furnishing all those listed
above with a copy. I trust this action on my part, along with all my other
activities for NAEB, will be interpreted only as it is intended, namely of working
for a ’’merger of interests’1 for the greatest utilization of television for educa¬
tion. I stand ready now, as I always have, to work for a mutual agreement that
will not only save educational television, but work for a stronger position.
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
November 17, 1955
